name: QuestionAnsweringSystem
short_description: It is a system using the apache uima structure to find out the relevant answers to a questions in the form of paragraphs from the knowledge base. The searching is done with the help of Solr which finds the relevant documents and returns them. From among the returned documents the relevant documents are found out of which again the relevant paragraphs are extracted. These paragraphs are assigned a score based on the occurrence of keywords from the query and the top three paragraphs are returned to the user.
summary: A question answering using uima architecture to answer queries
